name: Baingan Bharta (Eggplant Curry)
author: Yakuta Rasheed
summary: This is a really easy and tasty Indian dish that is sure to stir up your taste buds. Delicious baingan bharta is ready to eat with pita bread, Indian naan, or rice.
ingredients: 1  fresh jalapeno chile pepper, finely chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Place eggplant on a medium baking sheet
Bake 20 to 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until tender
Remove from heat, cool, peel, and chop
Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat
Mix in cumin seeds and onion
Cook and stir until onion is tender
Mix ginger garlic paste, curry powder, and tomato into the saucepan, and cook about 1 minute
Mix in eggplant and jalapeno pepper, and season with salt
Cover, and cook 10 minutes over high heat
Remove cover, reduce heat to low, and continue cooking about 5 minutes
